```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(USAboundaries)
library(mappingelections)

map_id <- "meae.congressional.congress04.tn.county"
```

<div class="map">

```{r election-map, echo = FALSE}
map_id %>%
  get_county_map_data() %>%
  map_counties()
```

</div>

In its first congressional election, Tennessee elected one representative to the Fourth Congress.

Tennessee used a statewide at-large system for electing its members to Congress.

Mapping this election is not possible because of the lack of election returns.

<div class="results-table">

```{r election-results, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
map_id %>%
  candidate_results() %>%
  results_to_table() %>%
  cat()
```

</div>
